# Snow Removal and Ice Control Services for Official Residences in Ontario

## Tender Notice

### Reference and Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: cb-347-25845165
* Solicitation Number: ES040
* Amendment Number: 8
* Publication Date: September 25, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: October 13, 2023, 15:00:00
* Amendment Date: October 13, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2026

### Tender Description

The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking services from experienced contractors to provide snow and ice control services for five official residences in Ontario. The contract is for a period of three years, from November 1, 2023, to May 31, 2026, with two one-year options to extend at the same terms and conditions.

Contract award will be based on the responsive offer with the lowest total evaluated price. Enquiries regarding this tender must be submitted in writing to the Senior Contract Officer, Emilie Scheckman, at emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca.

### Procurement Details

* Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contact Information

For inquiries and further information, please contact:

* Emilie Scheckman, Senior Contract Officer
* Email: emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca
* Phone: (343) 552-5976
* Address: 202-40 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 1C7, Canada

### Notice URL and Attachments

This tender notice and related attachments can be found on the Government Electronic Tendering Service
